---

These compacted pellets of bat guano, sulfur, and magical accelerants have long been a staple for spellcasters on the battlefield. Adding a _firestarter pellet_ to a [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) spell produces clinging flames that deal [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to all who fail the saving throw against the effect (doubling on a critical failure).
